channel.title: Rotary club Sofia Triaditsa
channel.description: Recent content on Rotary club Sofia Triaditsa

item.title: Online meeting with RC Istanbul Bebek
item.description: We had an inspiring, lovely and productive meeting between RC Sofia Triaditsa and Rotary Club of İstanbul-Bebek. Last time our friends shared their projects with us. This time we’ve showed them some of our projects.

item.title: Our third birthday
item.description: Over three years agoo a group of dedicated young people started building their own place of friendship, good intentions and desire to serve the community. We called it Rotary club Sofia Triaditsa!

item.title: A gift: a child hospital bed
item.description: Проект #ЗАДОБРОТО had started a campaign for providing 9 children hospital beds for the Sofia neurology ward. They had starded a crowd funding.

item.title: Online meeting with RC Istanbul Bebek
item.description: The global pandemia may be complicated, but meetings with friends are still on the menu. And even more so when we are talking about the long-expected and desired ones! Last night’s first online meeting between Rotary club of Sofia Triaditsa and Rotary Club of İstanbul-Bebek was the real proof of that!

item.title: Rotary Clubs Joint International Online Meeting
item.description: The biggest world-wide Rotary online meeting - with more than 66 participating clubs from all over the world!

item.title: Rotaract lector: Boyana
item.description: The third lector of Stay Proud Rotaractor - Webinar is Boyana Bankova!

item.title: Online meeting with RC Stara Zagora Beroe
item.description: A meeting co-chaired by Rotary Club Stara Zagora Beroe & Rotary club Sofia Triaditsa.

item.title: Afforestation
item.description: One of the foundamental ideas on which Rotary is built is that projects should be sustainable. That’s why we - Rotary Club Sofia Triaditsa - are actively involved in preservation of our environment. We had participated in numerous iniciatives for afforistation and cultivating parks. The trees provide us with oxygen and shade. They prevent landslides but are also play a crucial part of natural wildlife ecosystems. They are an integral part of preserving the water cycles and averting droughts.

item.title: Ambliopia screening
item.description: The amblyopia is a condition of a reduced eyesight. It is also known as “lazy eye”. By its nature it is not an eye disease but a neurological one. With it one eye becomes dominant and the brain rejects the image received by the other one. Diagnosis and treatment As with any other disease, the sooner it is found - the better. This especially the case with ambliopia. Most of the times there are no visible indicators that someone has it.

item.title: Contacts
item.description: Hotel Marinela is situated on a well connected place. Near it there are a parking and a subway station. Before visiting us, please contact us at rotary.sofia.triaditsa@gmail.com

item.title: Our story
item.description: We are a group of friends, gathered by the common desire to do good. We take our causes to the heart and we put a lot of passion in our work achieving them. Our selfless service to the community provides us both with a goal and a velocoty. We find real joy when we provide for the others. If this calls home to you, please contact us.

item.title: Rotary Foundation
item.description: The Rotary Foundation of Rotary International was founded in 1917 as a donation fund. The Congress in 1928 named it the Rotary Foundation. In 1931, the Foundation became a corporation, acting as a trustee and investment adviser, and in 1983 it was transformed into a non-profit corporation under the laws of Illinois, USA. The Rotary Foundation is funded solely by voluntary donations from Rotarians and Rotary friends. It is managed by its trustees solely for charitable and educational purposes, in accordance with its registration and statutes.

item.title: Planting of trees in Sofia
item.description: On March 19, 2017, members of Rotary Club Sofia Tangra, Rotary Club Sofia Vazrazhdane and Preliminary Rotary Club Sofia Triaditsa completed their joint project for afforestation and refreshment of green areas in Sofia. The selfless Rotarians planted 55 trees in Knyazhevska Garden, the yard of Alexandrovska Hospital and Yuzhen Park.
